name: ubuntu
install_commands: RUN echo "deb http://old-releases.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ RELEASE main restricted universe multiverse" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN echo "deb http://old-releases.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ RELEASE-updates main restricted universe multiverse" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN echo "deb http://old-releases.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ RELEASE-security main restricted universe multiverse" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN echo "deb http://old-releases.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ RELEASE-backports main restricted universe multiverse" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
# Exit 0 non manda tutto il circo in errore
